research.title: Indonesian Life Expectancy
research.subtitle: All data based on official research and statistics from the Indonesian Central Statistics Agency (BPS) and WHO Global Health Observatory.
research.overviewDesc: Life Expectancy is the average estimate of how many years a person can live. Indonesia's life expectancy continues to increase year over year.
research.factWomenLonger: Women live an average of {years} years longer than men
research.factBelowGlobal: Indonesia's life expectancy is still below the global average (73.4 years)
research.factNCD: Non-communicable diseases (NCDs) are the main cause of death

research.disclaimerText: All data and calculations in MindfulDeath are estimates based on statistical averages and scientific research. This is not an individual medical prediction.
